title: 高空流水
author: sdfgbs5
txt_content: 服务器领地不让高空流水如何在领地配置文件允许流水

replies.author: 千代田依
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 小_依 于 2020-7-13 16:26 编辑 

在Residence/config.yml中找到
    Flow:
和
    Place:
两项将NowaterFlow和NoWaterPlace改为false即可
岩浆就是NoLavaFlow和NoLavaPlace
本回答参考自https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-631343-1-1.html

replies.author: Sssss...
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Sssss... 于 2020-7-13 16:20 编辑 
Place:
      # Level from which one to start block lava and water place
      # This don't have effect in residence area
      Level: 63
      # With this set to true, playrs cant place lava outside residence
      NoLavaPlace: true
      # With this set to true, playrs cant place water outside residence
      NoWaterPlace: true
      Worlds:
      - world
config.yml中， true改成false，或者下面的列表里去掉你不需要的世界

ps.沙发讲的是禁止流动，禁止放置是这个place
